mapper.select: select sid, machine_no, member_id, modify_dt, insert_dt, is_valid, operation_type, operation_id,machine_type,plan_start_dt,plan_end_dt from t_bp_member_machine where sid = #{sid}
select sid, machine_no, member_id, modify_dt, insert_dt, is_valid, operation_type, operation_id,machine_type,plan_start_dt,plan_end_dt from t_bp_member_machine limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select sid, machine_no, member_id, modify_dt, insert_dt, is_valid, operation_type, operation_id,machine_type,plan_start_dt,plan_end_dt from t_bp_member_machine where is_valid = 1 and machine_no = #{machineNo} limit 1
select sid,machine_no from t_bp_member_machine where is_valid = 1 and plan_end_dt <= now()
mapper.insert: insert into t_bp_member_machine(sid,machine_no, member_id, modify_dt, insert_dt, is_valid, operation_type, operation_id,machine_type,plan_start_dt,plan_end_dt) values (#{sid},#{machineNo},#{memberId}, now(), now(), 1, #{operationType}, #{operationId},#{machineType},#{planStartDt},#{planEndDt})
mapper.update:
update t_bp_member_machine
machine_no = #{machineNo},
member_id = #{memberId},
modify_dt = #{modifyDt},
insert_dt = #{insertDt},
is_valid = #{isValid},
operation_type = #{operationType},
operation_id = #{operationId},
machine_type = #{machineType},
plan_start_dt = #{planStartDt},
plan_end_dt = #{planEndDt},
where sid = #{sid}
